title: Weisfeiler and Leman Go Loopy: A New Hierarchy for Graph Representational Learning
abstract: arXiv:2403.13749v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: We introduce $r$-loopy Weisfeiler-Leman ($r$-$\ell{}$WL), a novel hierarchy of graph isomorphism tests and a corresponding GNN framework, $r$-$\ell{}$MPNN, that can count cycles up to length $r + 2$. Most notably, we show that $r$-$\ell{}$WL can count homomorphisms of cactus graphs. This strictly extends classical 1-WL, which can only count homomorphisms of trees and, in fact, is incomparable to $k$-WL for any fixed $k$. We empirically validate the expressive and counting power of the proposed $r$-$\ell{}$MPNN on several synthetic datasets and present state-of-the-art predictive performance on various real-world datasets. The code is available at https://github.com/RPaolino/loopy

translated_title: Weisfeiler和Leman变得疯狂：一种新的图表示学习层次结构
translated_abstract: 我们引入$r$-loopy Weisfeiler-Leman ($r$-$\ell{}$WL)，这是一种新颖的图同构测试层次结构以及相应的GNN框架$r$-$\ell{}$MPNN，该框架可以计数长度最多为$r + 2$的循环。最重要的是，我们展示了$r$-$\ell{}$WL可以计数仙人掌图的同态。这严格地扩展了经典的1-WL，后者只能计数树的同态，实际上与任意固定的$k$-WL是不可比的。我们在几个合成数据集上经验验证了所提出的$r$-$\ell{}$MPNN的表达和计数能力，并展示了在各种真实数据集上具有最先进的预测性能。代码可在https://github.com/RPaolino/loopy找到。
tldr: 引入了新的图同构测试层次结构$r$-$\ell{}$WL以及相应的GNN框架$r$-$\ell{}$MPNN，能够计数长度最多为$r + 2$的循环，具有强大的表达能力和计数能力，在真实数据集上表现出最先进的预测性能。
en_tdlr: Introduced a novel hierarchy of graph isomorphism tests $r$-$\ell{}$WL and its corresponding GNN framework $r$-$\ell{}$MPNN, capable of counting cycles up to length $r + 2, showing superior expressive and counting power with state-of-the-art predictive performance on real-world datasets.
